verbs.description: [V: sistine] [ARG0: chapel exhibition] is opening at the tacoma armory now is your chance to see the famous sistine chapel without having to travel the tacoma armory is hosting an immersive event and recreating near - life size replicas of the frescoes that adorn the real sistine chapel in rome the limited time event will leave you speechless martin biallas joined new day to explain sistine chapel bridgeman images michelangelos sistine chapel broadway center box office twitter david fischer facebook tacoma armory executive director broadway center michelangelo sistine chapel
